message.content:
I need to identify the line item that represents the total income arising from ordinary activities and extract its value, along with its constituent line items.

Looking at the income statement, I can see that "Total Revenue" represents the total income arising from ordinary activities, with a value of 20318450.67.

The statement shows that "Main Business Revenue" is the only component of "Total Revenue", also with a value of 20318450.67.

Therefore:
- The value of total income is: 20318450.67
- The sub-item is "Main Business Revenue" with a value of 20318450.67

```json
{"solution": {'value': '20318450.67', 'sub_items': {'Main Business Revenue': '20318450.67'}}}
```
